edu.chalmers.service

Class AccountResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.chalmers.service.AbstractResource
      • edu.chalmers.service.AccountResource

  • public class AccountResource
extends AbstractResource
    Handles the account parts of the server, creation of account, update, delete, login.
    Author:
    Mikael Stolpe

      • logout

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response logout(java.lang.String token)
        Used by the game-server to drop an inactive account or by the user to logout.
        Parameters:
        token - token for account to drop or logout
        Returns:
        LOGOUT_FAILED if no such token or LOGOUT_OK if successfull
